brand.name: EazyService
brand.heroHeadline: Best AC Service & Repair in Delhi-NCR
brand.vipText: Save upto 15% off on cleaning, plumbing and ac services

services.title: Service
services.heading: Deep AC Dry & Wet Cleaning.
services.description: Breathe healthier air with our comprehensive cleaning service. We use eco-friendly chemicals and high-pressure pumps to remove every speck of dust and mold.
subheadings: Deep cleaning for better air quality.
services.highlight: Regular servicing improves cooling efficiency by up to 40%.

services.title: Repair
services.heading: Fast & Reliable AC Repair Services.
services.description: Don't let the heat get to you. Our expert team diagnoses and fixes all AC issues within hours, ensuring your comfort is restored immediately.
subheadings: Fast, reliable & affordable AC repair at your doorstep.
Same-day service across Delhi-NCR by certified technicians.

services.title: Installation/Uninstallation
services.heading: Expert AC Installation & Uninstallation.
services.description: We provide seamless setup and relocation for all major AC brands. Our technicians ensure perfect alignment and leak-proof fitting for long-lasting performance.
subheadings: Professional setup for all AC brands.

services.title: Gas Charging
services.heading: Premium AC Gas Refilling.
services.description: Restore your AC's cooling power with genuine refrigerant gas. We perform thorough leak detection before refilling to ensure a permanent solution.
subheadings: Genuine refrigerant gas for all models.
Leak detection and pressure testing included.

reviews.name: Rahul S.
reviews.text: Best AC service I've had in Delhi-NCR. They arrived within 25 minutes of calling for an emergency repair. Highly recommend!

reviews.name: Anita Sharma
reviews.text: Professional technicians. They did a wet cleaning of my split AC and the cooling is like new now. Affordable too.

reviews.name: Vikram K.
reviews.text: Needed urgent installation for my new AC. These guys were prompt and did a very clean job. Great service.

reviews.name: Priya Mehta
reviews.text: Gas refilling was done at a very reasonable price. Honest technicians who don't charge extra. My go-to for AC now.

faqs.q: How fast can you reach in Delhi-NCR?
faqs.a: We aim to reach any location in Delhi, Gurgaon, Noida, and surrounding areas within 20 to 45 minutes of booking, depending on traffic and exact location.

faqs.q: Do you provide same-day AC repair?
faqs.a: Yes, we specialize in same-day emergency repairs. Most calls are handled on the same day if booked before 6 PM.

faqs.q: Which AC brands do you support?
faqs.a: We support all major brands including Voltas, LG, Samsung, Daikin, Mitsubishi, Blue Star, Carrier, Godrej, and more.
Yes, we provide a 30-day free repeat visit guarantee on all our repair and service work. If the same issue recurs, we fix it for free.
